name: Neg!
description:
One day, some boxes have separated Neg from her lover Mr. mustache!
...and now we need a genius who knows "LOVE" and also who is intelligent enough to help Mr. Mustache and find out a way to pass away each level.
"Neg!" Is a great qualified, puzzle game that contains a romantic story. And these properties make you enjoy playing the game, whereas you can involve your creativity and intelligence.
Although we have some other romantic characters in the game while they have no mustache on their faces. So you can change your character and your lover if you are not satisfied with default characters.

Full version contains:
- removed all ads
- unlock all characters
- unlimited access to restart button for each level feature
- unlock all hints for each level
